channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024040209
item.description:
Report X-2024040209

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-12T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipper declared shipment as Tobacco products. upon x-raying the image we could see what appears to be multiple small batteries. Once we opened the box we found multiple boxes of battery powered vapes.

item.title: Report X-2024040206
item.description:
Report X-2024040206

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening shipment through the x-ray, found an item that looked like an aerosol can. Performed physical search and found 1 aerosol can of shaving cream. Removed item from shipment and shipped remaining items.

item.title: Report X-2024040173
item.description:
Report X-2024040173

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-12T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: SCC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WE ORIGINALLY RECEIVED THIS SHIPMENT ON 10MAR ON ORIG AWB 7065-2470 AND REFUSED DUE TO NO IAC PPWK AND FUEL SMELL ADVISED THAT THEY NEED TO CLEAN. RETURNED 11MAR AND AS ACCT CHARGES DENIED DUE TO OVERLIMIT. NEW AWB 7125 5413 WAS TENDERED ON 12MAR AND AFTER ACCEPTANCE DUE TO ITEMS SHRINK WRAPPED WE WERE PHYSICAL SCREENING AND DISCOVERED 10 FUEL BOTTLES AND ENTIRE PIECE WITH STRONG FUEL SMELL. SHIPMENT WAS TENDERED AS MACHINE PTS BUT ACTUALLY WAS CAMPING GEAR AND SNOW SKIES. CTCD THE SHIPPER AND STATED THAT THEY NEED TO TRANSPORTED BY GROUND.

item.description:

  • Description: As I was screening there was an aerosol can looking figure on the screen, went to open it, it was WD-40 inside a bag.
